name: HypnoCuck the Arrogant Rich Bitch Till She Falls
name_original: HypnoCuck the Arrogant Rich Bitch Till She Falls
description:
With no relatives to rely on, you end up staying at the household of a distant relative.
There, the daughter of the household head is an absolute bitch to you so...
Upon gaining some special powers from a demoness that appears before you,
you begin to exact your nefarious plan of erotic hypnocucking vengeance!!

[Features]
- Massage skip and Backlog functions
- Reminiscence mode implemented
- all events can be viewed in a single play through
- 816x624 resolution
13 base CG / 20 erotic scenes

This game is created using RPG Tkool MV.
* Please confirm system compatibility via the trial version.

[Characters] ----------------------------
Tiana Filtreich [The Heroine]
An arrogant rich bitch and daughter of the landlord.
She treats you like sht, showering you with abuse.

  • Rudolf [Protagonist = You]
    A young man the same age as Tiana.

  • Lily Rudelweiss
    A demoness that appears before Rudolf and
    provides him with the power to exact his revenge.

  • Lambert
    Tiana's fiancee, a man of noble birth.
